news.title: Titan v2.1 Shipping Update

news.content:
üö® We have a Titan v2.1 shipping update (action required below), in case you missed it in other channels:

For all orders received before Friday the 10th of September, we plan to ship as follows:

  • üåç Europe: Last week of September
  • üåé USA & Canada: Mid-October
  • üåè All Others: End of October

üìß Please check your inbox for an email from farming@threefold.tech (sent on September 7) in which we ask for details we need in order to set up your farm and node!

You can follow this forum thread for continued shipping updates or to ask any questions you might have.
news.excerpt: Titan v2.1 3Nodes will begin shipping the last week of September!

previous.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
previous.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

next.title: Titan v2.1 Shipping Update
next.excerpt: We began shipping Titans to Europe last week, but we still need information from many farmers.
